list_definition.definition: to form (a garment) from yarn (of wool etc) by making and connecting loops, using knitting-needles

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: She is teaching children to knit and sew
She knitted him a sweater for Christmas.
The bone in his arm took a long time to knit.
